text: Khloe Kardashian could not help a Revenge Body participant fix her broken relationship with her mother on Sunday's episode, but did help her get engaged. Shayla told the cameras she was on the show to get revenge on her mother for lying to her about the identity of her biological father. Despite a 12 - week complete lifestyle change and deciding to forgive her mother's deception, Shayla was still left frustrated when her mother refused to show up to the reveal party. Surprise proposal : Shayla was seeking revenge on her mother on Sunday's episode of Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian but got engaged instead Instead, boyfriend Toby was there and dropped to one knee to propose to Shayla.
